resources:
Prakash Enter your number +91 Name Login next Mobile Number We need to send OTP to authenticate your number OTP Please enter the otp sent to your number Enter OTP MapsActivity Welcome Add a complaint Name : Phone number HSN CODE Enter HSN CODE if possible Address Enter address of street light Mention any landmark near the street light Complaint Location Street Light Dear user, 


 This is a guide for you, to how to use this app. First place your phone in 10m range of the non-functional street light. On clicking the next button you will see a google maps interface.Now inorder for the technician to get exact location, wait for 1 minute until your location stabilizes. After this, you need to click the gps button on the top right corner of the app to retrieve exact coordinates.Please ensure that the location you provide is correct.Now click on the location button to move to the complaint page.In the complaint page you will asked to upload an image of the non-functional street light for which you want to complain. Ensure that the image you click is of an street light only. Now if you see any code on the street light, then mention it in the HSN code column. Also try to mention any landmark near the street light so that the technician can locate it easily.Click on the complaint button to register your complaint. Verify Generate OTP Register Male Female Other> Already have an account प्रकाश Welcome Back Go for sign up Password Set Password Gender Number NavigationActivity Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Android Studio android.studio@android.com Navigation header Settings
